original: intros z H0 H1 H2 H3. apply Z.eq_mul_1_nonneg. { apply ConstructiveCauchyReals.CReal_plus. - apply not_rel_prime2 with (x:=z) (y:=2) in H3. + apply H3. + unfold Z.divide. exists 1. auto. + intros H4. apply H2. apply Z.divide_1_r_nonneg. omega. auto. + auto. + auto. - apply H0. } apply Z.eq_mul_1_nonneg'. { apply sqr_spos. apply H1. } { apply sqr_lt. apply H1. apply H3. }
